bibl.title: The Historical Context of John Philoponus' De Opificio Mundi in the Culture of Byzantine-Coptic Egypt.
bibl.note: I. Introduction. - II. Background. - III. The De Opificio Mundi and After. - IV. The Opif. and its Audience. - V. Nachleben und Influence. - VI. Manuscript and Transmission. - VII. Conclusion.
